data.title: Software Engineer - React JS
data.description:
Looking for React Experts.


Job Overview

You must understand the ins and outs of ReactJS, with an obsession forcode quality. We want someone that is proud and obsessive in deliveringquality products. Get-it-done attitude as an independent thinker whoenjoys creating solutions in a collaborative environment.

Location: GOA
Work Mode: Hybrid


Requirements:

  • 2+ years of ReactJS / Angular JS Experience
  • Understand inheritance in Javascript and object oriented andfunctional programming concepts
  • Extensive experience with ReactJS, Redux
  • Expertise with HTML5 and CSS3
  • Comfortable translating complex visual designs into clean and modularHTML markup and CSS
  • Know how to work with version control systems.
  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related technical field.
  • Laptop/Desktop and Wired Broadband connection to be able to join Workfrom Home

Bonus Points if:

  • You have an advanced degree (e.g. M.Tech) in Computer Science orrelated technical field.
  • Knowledge of LESS/SASS, Bootstrap, PureCSS
  • Understanding of memory management in JavaScript.
  • Experience with Webpack, Typescript, ASP.NET, NodeJS

data.title: Business Development Executive
data.description:
Job Overview

We are in search of a Business Development Executive to be a part of ourSales team. You should be able to approach and acquire new customers.Besides, you should also be able to maintain long-term business relations with the existing customers.


Responsibilities:

  • Setting up meetings with potential clients to discuss opportunities.
  • Follow up with leads with the objective to convert them intocustomers.
  • Perform cold calling to set appointments to new businesses.BE
  • Staying up-to-date with the companyâ€™s products and services.
  • Helping customers with their queries and advising them on the purchaseof products and services.
  • Attending and participating in conferences and sessions to upgradeyour skills.
  • Conducting market research and identifying new business opportunities.
  • Creating and maintaining a database of potential customers.

Requirements:

  • Proven work experience in the Sales department as a BusinessDevelopment Executive, Business Development Representative or asimilar role.
  • Knowledge of various sales processes and techniques.
  • Familiarity with Microsoft Office tools and CRM software likeSalesforce and HubSpot.
  • Good time management and organizational skills.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Research-driven and detail-oriented individual.
  • A team player as well as able to work independently.
  • Having an experience of 2+ years.

data.title: Software Engineer -.NET
data.description:
Looking for skilled developers with a background in ASP.NET MVC / .NETCore.


Responsibilities:

This position requires active participation throughout the developmentlifecycle. Develop features/applications, including collaboration inrequirements definition, prototyping, design, coding, testing anddeployment. Implement robust, highly scalable, highly optimized backendcomponents. Evaluate and integrate latest technologies and third partylibraries/APIs. Contribute to design, code, specification andarchitectural reviews and technical documentation. Ensure that thelong-term architectural and performance strategies are considered withdesigning and coding solutions.

Location: GOA
Work Mode: Hybrid


Requirements:

  • 2+ years of ASP.NET MVC hands on Experience
  • B.E. (CSE/IT) or MCA graduate
  • Fair understanding in Object Oriented Design
  • {' '}Hands on experience in database action and DDL queries. (any one ofSQL, PostgreSql, Mysql, Access etc.)
  • Possess strong analytical/logical thinking
  • Good troubleshooting and communication skills
  • Ability to adhere to timeline
  • Having experience in developing Mobile Applications will be an addedadvantage
  • Understanding of Software Design Patterns will be an added advantage
  • Experience in .NET Core will be an added advantage
  • Experience in source control tool like GIT will be an added advantage.
